tests.name: Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) scream should log exact messages and verify blackboard content
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) scream should handle blackboard write errors gracefully
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) checkRootPollution should detect root pollution with exact message
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) checkRootPollution should allow all files in the allowed list
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) checkRootPollution should allow ttao-notes with regex
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) checkRootPollution should fail if any pattern fails
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) checkMutationProof should handle missing report with warning
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) checkMutationProof should handle missing mutants array in report
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) checkMutationProof should skip files with 0 mutants
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) checkMutationProof should handle malformed JSON
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) checkMutationProof should detect mutation failure with exact message
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) checkMutationProof should count Timeout as Killed
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) checkMutationProof should detect theater with exact message
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) checkMutationProof should allow exactly 80% score
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) checkMutationProof should handle report with total 0 mutants explicitly to kill mutant
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) auditContent should detect amnesia and bespoke types
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) auditContent should detect missing provenance in silver
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) scanMedallions should detect missing tests and handle existing ones
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) scanMedallions should handle complex filenames
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) scanMedallions should ignore .d.ts files
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) checkLedgerIntegrity should detect missing ledger
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) checkLedgerIntegrity should detect hash mismatch and chain breaks
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) checkLedgerIntegrity should detect hash mismatch when content is tampered
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) checkLedgerIntegrity should detect schema violations
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) checkLedgerIntegrity should handle ledger processing errors
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) checkManifestIntegrity should detect missing manifest
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) checkManifestIntegrity should detect port mismatch
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) checkManifestIntegrity should detect schema violations
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) checkManifestIntegrity should handle manifest processing errors
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) main should exit 1 on failure
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) main should exit 0 on success
Psychic Scream (Negative Trust Protocol) Zod Schemas should kill CacaoStepSchema and PlaybookSchema mutants
Red Regnant Manifest Validation should exist and be a valid YAML file
Red Regnant Manifest Validation should satisfy the HFO Manifest Schema
Red Regnant Manifest Validation should have the correct Galois Lattice coordinate (4,4)
Red Regnant Manifest Validation should align with the Red Queen archetype

config._comment: Isolated Stryker config for Port 4 (Red Regnant)
